purpose: Broad-spectrum small-molecule antiviral discovery for Flaviviridae and Togaviridae, aligned with BARDA SMART Antiviral Prize Desired Product Attributes.

governing_laws.PotencyLaw: EC50 <= 100 nM across predefined breadth panel.
governing_laws.ContextLaw: Only efficacy assays; safety/toxicity readouts excluded from potency logic.
governing_laws.UnitLaw: All potency values expressed explicitly in nM.
governing_laws.OrganismLaw: Targets restricted to Flaviviridae/Togaviridae lineage and defined host factors.

resistance.description: Penalizes narrow breadth and weak potency; favors conserved, multi-target engagement.

population_safety.logic: Derived from toxicity_index and mechanism; flags CAUTION where host-factor modulation or higher toxicity may impact vulnerable groups.
